data.description_html:
A touch from your hand, which sheds darkness like the blackest night, disrupts the life force of a living creature.
Your touch deals 1d6 points of damage per caster level (max 15d6), and 1d6+2 points of Constitution damage.
(A successful Fortitude saving throw negates the Constitution damage).
The spell has a special effect on an undead creature.
An undead touched by you takes no damage or Constitution loss, but it must make a successful Will saving throw or flee as if panicked for 1d4 rounds +1 round per caster level.
data.name: Night's Caress
data.rulebook: Libris Mortis: The Book of the Dead
